title: Swain QOL change
body: I think it would be helpful if Swain's Q targeted the lowest health minion, instead of the closest one. It would help his farming, help his waveclear, and even be thematically appropriate.

replies.body: They're already planning on adding an [execute](https://www.reddit.com/r/SwainMains/comments/4i9z0p/swain_mid_has_33_winrate_xpost_rleagueoflegends/d2wi175) to his Q that will instantly kill minions under a certain health threshold so you don't miss as much farm.  I like your idea a lot, but I think adding both changes would probably make his Q too good at farming.
Yeah, having both of those changes would be a bit much.
I doubt it considering how bad it is at farming a wave alone. It doesn't synergize well with W or R when trying to waveclear, and when used as a single spell it just kills two minions...

I mean, if it executed low HP minions AND targeted the lowest minions first, you could just drop it on the wave and never miss a CS again.  It wouldn't full clear the wave on its own, sure, but every minion that got low enough to last-hit would get instantly killed by it.  That would be too strong, it would take literally all skill out of last-hitting with Swain.

So the priority would be E-affected units, lowest-health champions, champions in general, lowest-health minions, closest minion? Because that's the general priority you'd have as Swain, I think, but if he wants to fry a full-health squishy with his full-combo over a half-health tank, he'll be more than capable of that.
That's pretty much the idea, I guess. I was mostly thinking for farming, but prioritizing low-health champions makes sense too.
Also his W time to root is a bit too long.  I should be able to Q slow someone and W the edge direction and root them.  Currently 90% of champs can walk and not get rooted.
That's kinda the whole point why swain mains hated the Q change, because you used to be able to do just that, and you can't with the new q.

But I LOVE LOVE the new Q.  The Harass is epic.  Walk up E > W in front of them > Q behind them
They see the W so back away right into the Q and take crap tons of damage while I farm.

I just wish the W could be used for more then that and team fights.

As a Swain main I love the new Q change as well, if you make it to full build it actually decimates waves too. The W is actually a pretty good damage source if you max it 2nd(it also gets a 2sec root at max), I rarely ever see late game anymore and if I do it's super one sided so I'm not sure if this is still the case. It used to half health ADCs and squishy mages if you hit em with E first though. If they had no MR sometimes it'd even drop their health by 2/3rds with an E before it. But if I get super ahead in lane now I can still do good burst damage with the W if I hit someone, people don't expect it to hit hard so sometimes I can bait them into thinking getting hit by it is better than getting hit by something else. Then they lose a lot of health and I can usually finish them off. So the W is (or at least was, it hasn't changed in the last patch so it should still be) a great source of damage mid-late game if combo'd with the E.

-Vaz
i feel like it should be multi-target or aoe..
